evidence.claim: Athenium Analytics utilizes AWS for cloud services and infrastructure.
The platform complies with HIPAA standards for data handling and processing.
Integration with FHIR for healthcare data exchange is part of Athenium's architecture.
Snowflake is employed for data warehousing solutions in their analytics engine.
They utilize Kafka for streaming data processes involving health data integrations.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards and APIs in healthcare analytics, indicating relevance for data exchange.
